text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: duryodhanaM mocayitvA pANDuputrA mahAbalAH
text.ur: duryodhanaṁ mocayitvā pāṇḍuputrā mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: kim akArSur vane tasmiMs tan mamAkhyAtum arhasi
text.ur: kim akārṣur vane tasmiṁs tan mamākhyātum arhasi

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tataH zayAnaM kaunteyaM rAtrau dvaitavane mRgAH
text.ud: ततः शयानं कौन्तेयं रात्रौ द्वैतवने मृगाः
text.ur: tataḥ śayānaṁ kaunteyaṁ rātrau dvaitavane mr̥gāḥ

text.ascii: svapnAnte darzayAm Asur bASpakaNThA yudhiSThiram
text.ur: svapnānte darśayām āsur bāṣpakaṇṭhā yudhiṣṭhiram

text.ascii: tAn abravIt sa rAjendro vepamAnAn kRtAJjalIn
text.ur: tān abravīt sa rājendro vepamānān kr̥tāñjalīn

text.ascii: brUta yad vaktukAmAH stha ke bhavantaH kim iSyate
text.ud: ब्रूत यद्वक्तुकामाः स्थ के भवन्तः किमिष्यते
text.ur: brūta yad vaktukāmāḥ stha ke bhavantaḥ kim iṣyate

text.ascii: evam uktAH pANDavena kaunteyena yazasvinA
text.ur: evam uktāḥ pāṇḍavena kaunteyena yaśasvinā

text.ascii: pratyabruvan mRgAs tatra hatazeSA yudhiSThiram
text.ur: pratyabruvan mr̥gās tatra hataśeṣā yudhiṣṭhiram

text.ascii: vayaM mRgA dvaitavane hataziSTAH sma bhArata
text.ud: वयं मृगा द्वैतवने हतशिष्टाः स्म भारत
text.ur: vayaṁ mr̥gā dvaitavane hataśiṣṭāḥ sma bhārata

text.ascii: notsIdema mahArAja kriyatAM vAsaparyayaH
text.ur: notsīdema mahārāja kriyatāṁ vāsaparyayaḥ

text.ascii: bhavanto bhrAtaraH zUrAH sarva evAstrakovidAH
text.ur: bhavanto bhrātaraḥ śūrāḥ sarva evāstrakovidāḥ

text.ascii: kulAny alpAvaziSTAni kRtavanto vanaukasAm
text.ur: kulāny alpāvaśiṣṭāni kr̥tavanto vanaukasām

text.ascii: bIjabhUtA vayaM ke cid avaziSTA mahAmate
text.ur: bījabhūtā vayaṁ ke cid avaśiṣṭā mahāmate

text.ascii: vivardhemahi rAjendra prasAdAt te yudhiSThira
text.ur: vivardhemahi rājendra prasādāt te yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: tAn vepamAnAn vitrastAn bIjamAtrAvazeSitAn
text.ur: tān vepamānān vitrastān bījamātrāvaśeṣitān

text.ascii: mRgAn dRSTvA suduHkhArto dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: mr̥gān dr̥ṣṭvā suduḥkhārto dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: tAMs tathety abravId rAjA sarvabhUtahite rataH
text.ur: tāṁs tathety abravīd rājā sarvabhūtahite rataḥ

text.ascii: tathyaM bhavanto bruvate kariSyAmi ca tat tathA
text.ud: तथ्यं भवन्तो ब्रुवते करिष्यामि च तत्तथा
text.ur: tathyaṁ bhavanto bruvate kariṣyāmi ca tat tathā

text.ascii: ity evaM pratibuddhaH sa rAtryante rAjasattamaH
text.ur: ity evaṁ pratibuddhaḥ sa rātryante rājasattamaḥ

text.ascii: abravIt sahitAn bhrAtqn dayApanno mRgAn prati
text.ur: abravīt sahitān bhrātr̥̄n dayāpanno mr̥gān prati

text.ascii: ukto rAtrau mRgair asmi svapnAnte hatazeSitaiH
text.ur: ukto rātrau mr̥gair asmi svapnānte hataśeṣitaiḥ

text.ascii: tanubhUtAH sma bhadraM te dayA naH kriyatAm iti
text.ud: तनुभूताः स्म भद्रं ते दया नः क्रियतामिति
text.ur: tanubhūtāḥ sma bhadraṁ te dayā naḥ kriyatām iti

text.ascii: te satyam AhuH kartavyA dayAsmAbhir vanaukasAm
text.ur: te satyam āhuḥ kartavyā dayāsmābhir vanaukasām

text.ascii: sASTamAsaM hi no varSaM yad enAn upayuJjmahe
text.ur: sāṣṭamāsaṁ hi no varṣaṁ yad enān upayuñjmahe

text.ascii: punar bahumRgaM ramyaM kAmyakaM kAnanottamam
text.ur: punar bahumr̥gaṁ ramyaṁ kāmyakaṁ kānanottamam

text.ascii: marubhUmeH ziraH khyAtaM tRNabindusaraH prati
text.ur: marubhūmeḥ śiraḥ khyātaṁ tr̥ṇabindusaraḥ prati

text.ascii: tatremA vasatIH ziSTA viharanto ramemahi
text.ur: tatremā vasatīḥ śiṣṭā viharanto ramemahi

text.ascii: tatas te pANDavAH zIghraM prayayur dharmakovidAH
text.ur: tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ śīghraṁ prayayur dharmakovidāḥ

text.ascii: brAhmaNaiH sahitA rAjan ye ca tatra sahoSitAH
text.ud: ब्राह्मणैः सहिता राजन्ये च तत्र सहोषिताः
text.ur: brāhmaṇaiḥ sahitā rājan ye ca tatra sahoṣitāḥ

text.ascii: indrasenAdibhiz caiva preSyair anugatAs tadA
text.ur: indrasenādibhiś caiva preṣyair anugatās tadā

text.ascii: te yAtvAnusRtair mArgaiH svannaiH zucijalAnvitaiH
text.ur: te yātvānusr̥tair mārgaiḥ svannaiḥ śucijalānvitaiḥ

text.ascii: dadRzuH kAmyakaM puNyam AzramaM tApasAyutam
text.ur: dadr̥śuḥ kāmyakaṁ puṇyam āśramaṁ tāpasāyutam

text.ascii: vivizus te sma kauravyA vRtA viprarSabhais tadA
text.ur: viviśus te sma kauravyā vr̥tā viprarṣabhais tadā

text.ascii: tad vanaM bharatazreSThAH svargaM sukRtino yathA
text.ur: tad vanaṁ bharataśreṣṭhāḥ svargaṁ sukr̥tino yathā
